data.eml:eml: A new genus and species of micro bee flies from Brazil (Diptera: Mythicomyiidae: Psiloderoidinae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Lamas, Carlos J. E., Falaschi, Rafaela L., Evenhuis, Neal L. (2015): A new genus and species of micro bee flies from Brazil (Diptera: Mythicomyiidae: Psiloderoidinae). Zootaxa 3955 (3): 403-416, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3955.3.7
